医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
世卫组织研究列出了需要新疫苗的主要病原体世界卫生组织 (WHO) 今天在 eBioMedicine 上发表的一项新研究将经常在社区引起疾病的 17 种病原体列为新疫苗开发的首要任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/WHO-study-names-top-pathogens-in-need-of-new-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/WHO-study-names-top-pathogens-in-need-of-new-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e00f829d-dc6f-4030-90ce-c5ff8199fc35 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:44:40 -0500 WHO study names top pathogens in need of new vaccines
研究发现高负担地区儿童结核病风险较高新的研究结果还表明，生活在结核病高负担环境中的儿童在整个童年时期每年感染结核病的风险始终很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-finds-high-risk-of-pediatric-tuberculosis-in-high-burden-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-finds-high-risk-of-pediatric-tuberculosis-in-high-burden-areas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaf2c976-8004-4f71-be2e-8cd874fa98c6 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:42:03 -0500 Study finds high risk of pediatric tuberculosis in high-burden areas
新研究发现 16 个有助于乳腺癌生存的基因约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心的科学家们已经鉴定出 16 个基因，乳腺癌细胞在逃离肿瘤的低氧区域后，利用这些基因在血液中生存。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/New-research-uncovers-16-genes-that-aid-breast-cancer-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/New-research-uncovers-16-genes-that-aid-breast-cancer-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=179dce0b-3b70-4e6a-a86c-8bb2c90fe2dd Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:34:55 -0500 New research uncovers 16 genes that aid breast cancer survival
遗传和环境驱动因素影响儿童早期 1 型糖尿病风险TEDDY 研究的研究人员强调了特定的遗传和环境因素如何驱动与儿童 1 型糖尿病相关的早期自身免疫，并强调不同自身抗体的不同模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Genetic-and-environmental-drivers-shape-early-type-1-diabetes-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Genetic-and-environmental-drivers-shape-early-type-1-diabetes-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=834b1de7-6c6c-494d-8d2e-7fcec5e089da Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:34:00 -0500 Genetic and environmental drivers shape early type 1 diabetes risk in children
研究显示美国心力衰竭患者的姑息治疗率较低圣路易斯大学研究人员的一项研究表明，在美国，只有八分之一的心力衰竭患者在诊断后五年内接受姑息治疗咨询。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-reveals-low-rates-of-palliative-care-for-heart-failure-病人-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-reveals-low-rates-of-palliative-care-for-heart-failure-病人-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33ee50a3-9d2d-4dbb-a7f1-7e98a2ea043c Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:29:00 -0500 Study reveals low rates of palliative care for heart failure patients in the U.S.
创新的心脏模型可以改变个性化心脏治疗由北卡罗来纳大学教堂山分校的研究人员领导的团队开发了一种创新的人类心脏血流计算机模型，有望改变我们理解、诊断和治疗心脏病的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Innovative-heart-model-could-transform-personalized-cardiac-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Innovative-heart-model-could-transform-personalized-cardiac-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e6ca175-5e8d-4f6f-ad66-89b47302087b Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:24:47 -0500 Innovative heart model could transform personalized cardiac therapy
对 Epstein-Barr 病毒的抗体反应升高与多发性硬化症风险增加有关研究人员发现了针对 Epstein-Barr 病毒蛋白 EBNA1 的独特抗体特征，该特征与多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的交叉反应性免疫反应相关。这种联系为 EBV 感染如何驱动 MS 发病机制提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Elevated-antibody-responses-to-Epstein-Barr-virus-linked-to-increased-risk-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Elevated-antibody-responses-to-Epstein-Barr-virus-linked-to-increased-risk-of-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2783d107-5a07-4bed-9201-37d72829e392 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:18:00 -0500 Elevated antibody responses to Epstein-Barr virus linked to increased risk of multiple sclerosis
财团获得 1000 万欧元用于研究体内组织力学欧洲研究理事会正在向由 Helmholtz-Zentrum Hereon、苏黎世联邦理工学院和格拉茨工业大学组成的财团提供总计 1000 万欧元的资金，用于开发确定活体人体组织机械性能的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Consortium-receives-10-million-euros-to-study-in-vivo-tissue-mechanics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Consortium-receives-10-million-euros-to-study-in-vivo-tissue-mechanics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18865564-efaf-4f60-87e7-25e00f990228 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 21:04:40 -0500 Consortium receives 10 million euros to study in vivo tissue mechanics
研究表明额外教育对大脑衰老没有影响得益于一项涉及 30,000 人的“自然实验”，拉德堡德大学医学中心的研究人员能够非常精确地确定额外一年的教育对大脑的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-reveals-no-impact-of-extra-education-on-brain-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-reveals-no-impact-of-extra-education-on-brain-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15cb23f0-8c40-4fb7-ba53-95c04ec11a43 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 20:49:56 -0500 Study reveals no impact of extra education on brain aging
机器学习识别类风湿性关节炎和骨质疏松症之间的关键基因类风湿性关节炎是一种常见疾病，影响全球约 1700 万人。这种疾病是由免疫细胞攻击关节引起的，会导致疼痛、肿胀以及软骨和骨骼损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Machine-learning-identizes-key-genes-linking-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Machine-learning-identizes-key-genes-linking-rheumatoid-arthritis-and-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b8f41d-2971-44e5-9228-bb0c0f2f7e59 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 20:43:52 -0500 Machine learning identifies key genes linking rheumatoid arthritis and osteoporosis
